website_summaries.verdict: Between its true-to-the-show design, ultra-sturdy construction, and perfect size for young fans of the show to carry around, this doll is a solid choice.
pros: Squishy core body with durable rubber head, arms, and legs
Doll looks exactly like the cartoon character
cons: Caillou’s hat doesn’t cling to his head particularly well

customer_reviews.title: Caillou is cute, that's about all I can say
customer_reviews.text: This is a basic Caillou doll. He's cute, with his giant head and teeny little eyes. He's HARD though! So keep that in mind if you have rowdy kiddos. I bought him for my twins, (one each of course), and they were mildly impressed. Their favorite part (and my least favorite) is that his socks and shoes come off. Yeah, more pieces of Caillou to find at night when the OCD kicks in and they need ALL OF CAILLOU in order to sleep. :) His cap doesn't stay on at all, another piece to lose under the couch.
customer_reviews.author: joemama

customer_reviews.title: Had 1 year so far, no problems
customer_reviews.text: Was hesitant about buying at first based on the negative reviews on Amazon. But since my daughter LOVES Caillou, and I couldn't find anything else like it, I decided to give it a go. Been about a year and so far, we haven't had any problems! And this is with my daughter sleeping with the doll and taking it everywhere on a pretty consistent basis. It arrived in tact and undamaged. Since using it, no parts have come undone or fallen apart. Satisfied so far.
customer_reviews.author: S. Proc

customer_reviews.title: Daughters 1st birthday
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this doll because she loves Caillat and I wanted something that would be durable and last. His head is hard plastic and so are his legs so it evens out the ease to carry it in her tiny arms but holds up to drops. The cap doesn't stay on very well at all and we have no clue where it is but I don't tthink my daughter really cares.
customer_reviews.author: E.Cauley

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was reluctant to make this purchase but very glad I did. Much bigger than I thought it would be. Definitely worth the $20 and I would buy again. My two year old adores this Caillou doll.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My son loved it, sad it didn't even make it through Christmas Day!
customer_reviews.text: This doll came promptly (Thanks Amazon!) and was wrapped and under the tree Christmas morning for my son to open with gleaming eyes! It is a shame the doll is so poorly made. One afternoon of playing, his arm popped off. It is a cheaply made plastic doll apparently held together with small twist ties. I wish someone would make a higher quality Caillou doll! For this price, it really should last longer than one day!
customer_reviews.author: Casey T

customer_reviews.title: My niece 2 loved this doll because it is like her baby dolls ...
customer_reviews.text: Big hit with kids and parents at my neices party. My niece 2 loved this doll because it is like her baby dolls and its Caillou! I haven't seen this in stores so everyone was impressed they even sold these. I was worried the face details would be bad or clothes would be stringy from reading the reviews but, mine looked just as shown in the picture.The plastic on the box was popped oped but might of been caused from the delivery and other items in the box but, the doll itself was fine / only reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5.
customer_reviews.author: bubby

customer_reviews.title: Headless Caillou
customer_reviews.text: My son loves Caillou, so I purchased this doll in August for his birthday in September. In the box, the doll appeared cute and my son was quite excited. Once Caillou was removed from the box, his head fell off. Apparently, the head is attached to the body with a round metal ring that was broke. I couldn't believe how cheaply the doll was put together! When I went to return it, I found out that my refund window had closed, so I have contacted Amazon to see if they will still do an exchange. If not, I guess my son with have fun with his Caillou head. The doll is cute, but definitely not worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: SMil

customer_reviews.title: Great doll for any child who loves Caillou!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my granddaughter. Caillou is one of her favorites. She loves it. A couple days after I gave it to her, I walk into my room and say Caillou's clothes laying on the clothes hamper. I asked her why she took his clothes off. She pointed to the bed and there he was tucked in with her other dolls, "Caillou was tired and wanted to go to sleep!" she told me. It's a great doll for any child who loves Caillou!
customer_reviews.author: S. Bain

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the perfect gift for under the tree from Santa :). My son loved to watch Caillou when he was a kid and this year he will be 18 and we are having a “childhood memory” Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Slater

customer_reviews.title: Cute doll!  Poor quality control.
customer_reviews.text: The doll is adorable. I think the quality seems as good as other similar dolls however, the hem on the shirt is messed up. And unfortunately it's right on the front so it's noticeable. I really like everything about the doll except for the quality on the stitching. I wish they wouldn't have sent the doll out with the shirt messed up.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Caillou doll
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this doll for my grandson because he loves the tv program Caillou. He loves the doll. He kisses it and hugs it and absolutely loves it but the construction of Caillou is vet poor. His arm is only held on by a string and if a little one holds the doll by the arm at all, which anyone knows they do its going to fall apart and that is exactly what is happening. I'm very disappointed in it especially since it wasn't an inexpensive toy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Thrilled Grandson
customer_reviews.text: My grandson is 2 years old, and his FAVORITE cartoon is Caillou. Caillou was one of the first words he could say. My wife gave him this doll, and now she's the best grandma in the world. Caillou goes everywhere with him. The doll is very well built, as are the clothes, shoes, and hat. It's not a tiny doll, I feel it's the right size for a 2 or 3 year old. If your child or grandchild likes Caillou, they will LOVE this doll.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick T Parks

customer_reviews.title: 7" inches is not 14".
customer_reviews.text: This doll is 7" PLEASE stop posting it is 14" tall. It is NOT... an LP is 12x12' I just purchased it, messaured it. It must have been a man who miscalculated it's size... read me? Cute doll. 7" tall.
customer_reviews.author: Raven

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made- limbs falling off first month!
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would be a better buy than the soft Caillou doll but was wrong. Bought for my 2 year old daughter and in 2 weeks the leg came off completely. My husband was able to attach it again with a zip tie since that is how it was on. About 2 weeks later the arm came off. Cheaply made doll for the $30 spent. Wish it wasn't because she loves it anyway and doesn't play rough with him at all!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie G. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: The kids love it.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased four at the same time for our four kids (3-5 years old) and they all love their Caillou dolls! The pants are strangely shaped with where the elastic is so they don't stay on very securely and the same goes for the hat. But, the kids love undressing and dressing them, anyways, so the only downside is that Caillous is more often than not naked when he's not in use.
customer_reviews.author: cbhuff

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE for Caillou fans!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter's 2nd birthday. Caillou is her favorite show... this is a must have for Caillou fans! She takes it everywhere we go, won't go to sleep without it, and shows it to everyone. She pretends to feed him, give him a bath, etc. Caillou doll has replaced all her other dolls. I think its a bit overpriced, but well worth it if your kid really loves the show. :)
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Bentrup

customer_reviews.title: Hat & clothes easily removable
customer_reviews.text: My 21 month old son loves Caillou and this is a cute doll. Not as cuddly as I had hoped but still cute. Hat doesn't stay on at all so don't count on it unless you glue it. And if your child likes to remove clothing on dolls... Plan on Caillou being undressed often. I had hoped his clothes would be sown on but they Velcro on & off easily so then w/o clothes or hat, he doesn't look much like Caillou. But my son still loves him : )
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Doll has hard plastic head.
customer_reviews.text: I did not realize that this dog had a hard plastic face or I would not have bought it In the Christmas confusion I either did not read clearly enough about it or it wasn't posted. My grandson still likes him but he has this big Old hard fat head.
customer_reviews.author: Sammi Baty-Wright

customer_reviews.title: Must buy for any Caillou fan!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worth it ! 2 yr old loooves it. Very sturdy but yet soft. Very durable. Son sleeps with it every night.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Caillou
customer_reviews.text: My son loves Caillou. When we saw this doll, we thought it would be a great gift for his 3rd Birthday. As we were dressing and undressing Caillou, his arm fell right off! I was even helping my son with this so it wasn't that the Caillou doll was forced awkwardly into positions in order to get him dressed. Very disappointed about the missing arm, but other than that, it is a nice doll.
customer_reviews.author: R. B.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my two year old on Christmas and a few weeks later the leg fell off and the body is ripping apart. She has not been rough on the doll at all and we do not have pets that have destroyed it. It is cute, but unless it is not going to be played with and just sit on a shelf, it will fall apart. For the price, you would think that this toy would be better put together. It is only held together with cable ties- that break through the foam body. She keeps asking for 'Baby Caillou", so I hope to find a completely plush one that will not come apart so easily.
customer_reviews.author: kucrystal

customer_reviews.title: She loves him
customer_reviews.text: My grand baby's bff- she takes him everywhere. His bald head wipes clean after a good drag through the mulch/ garden. She holds his hand while falling asleep . Perfect size for an almost two year old to carry around. If the kid in your life loves caillou this is a no brainer.
customer_reviews.author: Jd chester springs

customer_reviews.title: This item arrived in the projected timeframe and was in ...
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived in the projected timeframe and was in new condition. My 2 year old son loves it. The hat, however doesn't seem to want to stay on. Calliou doesn't usually wear a hat though so I'm not sure why it is included.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen Cromwell

customer_reviews.title: NOT WORTH IT!
customer_reviews.text: Id give 0 stars if I could. I gave this doll to my daughter around 730 today, for her birthday, and one of the legs fell off prior to noon! All my daughter did was carry the doll around.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: ok for a 2 year old
customer_reviews.text: Caillou is my 2 year old's favorite show. Unfortunately, this doll was not a huge hit. He hardly ever picks it up. The hat comes off and is never on the doll. The shirt and pants come off, as do the socks and shoes. We've had it a few weeks and all I can find is one shoe... it's in the dog crate, but I don't blame the dog.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis & Veronica

customer_reviews.title: It's well made
customer_reviews.text: I'd like to say that I liked this caillou and so did my baby daughter shes 6months old and has been watching caillou since she was 3 months old and she was super excited to receive him.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Angel Galvan

customer_reviews.title: Instant best friends
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this doll for our 18 month old daughter that is Caillou obsessed. From the moment she opened the box and had Daddy remove Caillou from his packaging, he's been everywhere she's been. Up in the mornings watching his own show along with her, trips to Grannie's where they watch more of his show, and in the bed at night with her along with his own kisses and hugs from Mommy. I'm so grateful that we found this doll and only wish it had been a little easier to come by. I think we along with Dylan wish that we could find a Rosie and Gilbert doll to go along with Caillou on our family outings. :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My daughter LOVES this doll
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Caillou doll for my 2 yr old daughter's birthday. She LOVES this doll. She carries him with us on errands and when we go out. I have had several parents ask me where I found such a good quality, and large, Caillou doll and I always refer them to Amazon. This doll is a perfect gift for any child that is a fan of Caillou!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but fragile...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my 2y/o daughter's birthday. Pricey for a doll this size. She loved the doll and started playing with it immediately. After one week I noticed the doll's arm was coming detached. The construction uses plastic wire ties to attach the doll's arms to the internal fabric - this does not bode well for longevity. I fixed poor Caillou with some of my own plastic wire ties and some clear duct tape. If I had known the doll was of this quality, I would not have purchased him.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Carbon

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product
customer_reviews.text: No problems with this doll. My son loves Caillou so this was a Christmas Present. When he saw the box, his face lit up and he immediately had to open it up to give him hugs. It has a very good similarity to the cartoon character which we have had problems with other characters we have purchased for him.
customer_reviews.author: Cortney

customer_reviews.title: Grandkids love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of theses my grandson and granddaughter watch Caillou everyday and now there best bud can sit along with them. It is well worth what i spent! the dool is good quailty and the perfect hiegt for a 2 and 3 year old.Great buy :)
customer_reviews.author: lisa

customer_reviews.title: Very bad quality
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews on how bad made was the doll but, still I wanted to give it a chance thinking that with so many bad reviews, the company might have change it or something. I bought it for my daughter, after 3 weeks the left arm ripped off. The hat does not stay put and the pants keep going down. My daughter loved it otherwise I would have returned it as soon as it riped off. Very dissapointed and very expensive for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Karina

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: My son loves Caillou but barely plays with this. My guess as to why is because a 3 year old that loves Caillou sees Caillou as slighter older/bigger than himself. The doll, by contrast, is like 1/2 his size. Nothing wrong with the doll as a doll--seems well-made etc. But the concept seems flawed.
customer_reviews.author: A. Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Happy Granddaughter
customer_reviews.text: My almost 2 yr old granddaughter's first Caillou doll's leg came off right after Christmas and I returned it to WalMart but they didn't have anymore online. She sooo loves Caillou that I had to find another one and it wasn't easy. But this doll was in perfect condition as stated and she totally loves it!!! Happy Nana!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great idea, in theory, but poor quality
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I ordered this Caillou doll as a Christmas gift for our two-year-old son who talks about the character all the time. He loved the doll so much when he received it and it quickly became one of his "lovies". The clothes seem cheaply made, but that's not the sticking point. Within a month one of Caillou's arms completely came out of the area where it was "secured." i.e., poor stiching not up to par with how a child plays with toys. We never would have bought this had we known that the quality was so poor. There's no episode about Caillou's dislocated arm, but we can write one now.
customer_reviews.author: Mysty Krisiak

customer_reviews.title: Love this look of this caillou leg broke off like ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this look of this caillou leg broke off like other reviews have said... impossible to fix... too expensive for it to break like that =\
customer_reviews.author: Dianag917

customer_reviews.title: Daughter Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Got this doll for my daughter's 2nd birthday. Ordered it and it was here in 2 days. She loves watching the show (the only show she will sit still and actually watch) and when she saw the doll she was really happy/surprised. She hasn't mastered talking yet, she calls him Cai Cai. She walks everywhere with this doll. Great buy:)
customer_reviews.author: Amazongirl

customer_reviews.title: Love Caillou
customer_reviews.text: This doll is a great size! Soft and the face while simple...is detailed. I got this for my grandson last year for Christmas, he loved it, dragged it around everywhere...if your child or grand child likes Caillou, he or she will love this doll:) Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Fran

customer_reviews.title: Generic Caillou Doll
customer_reviews.text: This doll is okay but nothing really great. Very generic looking. For a very young child this doll might pass, and keep them happy for a little while, but they lose interest in it quite quickly. It's just too plain. It was a good price, and I guess thats what you get for trying to keep the cost of a toy down. I would recommend that if you are going to purchase one of these dolls that you spend a little more and get something of better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Daveswife

customer_reviews.title: Caillou lover
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this doll. His shirt gets dirty very easily.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonMOM1229

customer_reviews.title: caillou the 14 inch classic doll
customer_reviews.text: i bought thus for my 3 yr old niece and she still hasnt put it down and its been 5 days amazing if you have young kids or grandkids or in my opinion any child 1 to 5 i say what are you waiting for buy it already
customer_reviews.author: destry prysiazny

customer_reviews.title: Santa's gift tossed to Northpole
customer_reviews.text: Santa(Shh..) Gave this to my 2 year old daughter who loves Caillou.. One week of gentle play and his Hand came off exposing synthetic fiber filling inside - Called amazon and got refund.. The challenge is how to explain this to the toddler? I told her that Santa(Amazon) took it away and will give two toys next Christmas :)
customer_reviews.author: VBG

customer_reviews.title: Great doll for little ones
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old daughter is a huge Caillou fan so we bought this doll as a Christmas gift. She doesn't play with many dolls but she loves carrying around Caillou, giving him hugs and kisses, and talking to him like he is real.
customer_reviews.author: Friday98

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: my daughter loves this, but it didnt come as pictured. Different outfit.
customer_reviews.author: Mick

customer_reviews.title: hat
customer_reviews.text: my only problem is that there's no way to secure the hat to caillou's head. Gets lost easily
customer_reviews.author: Fanni M.

customer_reviews.title: Authentic Looking Caillou Doll
customer_reviews.text: We gave this to our 3 year old nephew for Christmas and he loved it. He carried Caillou around with him during most of our visit. As for durability, only time will tell. But so far so good. Caillou still has all his limbs!
customer_reviews.author: KBW

customer_reviews.title: We love Callou
customer_reviews.text: This Caillou doll is very cute but not very durable. The arm came off the first day we opened it. Amazon was very quick in sending a replacement but the new doll looks like it will also fall apart soon. We love that the second doll has shoes and socks that come off!
customer_reviews.author: saturn_4_peace

customer_reviews.title: Great little doll if your child loves Calliou
customer_reviews.text: My daughter squeeled when she saw this. Calliou is one of her favorite characters from Sprout and PBS Kids. This is a great little doll and he is durable plastic so basically indestructable. I am fond of this little bald headed fellow myself.
customer_reviews.author: rosalee s.

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart
customer_reviews.text: We bought this doll for our kids for Christmas and within two weeks it's arm was hanging by a plastic connection. We contacted Amazon who were wonderful and sent us a new replacement one. It lasted a little while longer, but within 5 weeks it too had started to come loose at the arm and the side stitching on the torso came open.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Pond

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be a good quality product
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a good quality product. My only complaint is the hat does not stay on at all. Besides that my daughter loves it
customer_reviews.author: MEKE

customer_reviews.title: High quality doll.
customer_reviews.text: Such a great doll. The body is white under clothes. Everything comes off so they can dress the doll over and over. The box was destroyed in the shipping process.
customer_reviews.author: Bea Nu

customer_reviews.title: The toddler likes it
customer_reviews.text: It is rigid head, arms and legs with soft body. Sorta heavy but being a fan of the Caillu cartoon, our toddler seems to like it . I don't really think much about the doll, but my wife wanted to get it as a christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: M. Widner

customer_reviews.title: cute doll
customer_reviews.text: Our 2yr old daughter loves the cartoon Caillou. This was a Christmas gift and she plays with this more than anything else we got her. The price seems high but the doll is really good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: But waaay too much money for the doll.....but hey - you have to pay for it if you want it. You can't find them in the store! My granddaughter watches Caillou every night, so she was very happy to get the doll. Of course we have lost the hat already, but that's ok!
customer_reviews.author: Nana

customer_reviews.title: Great doll, but the leg and arm fell off ...
customer_reviews.text: Great doll, but the leg and arm fell off shortly after opening it. We were able to rig it with zipties but disappointed it fell apart so quickly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was ok but not great.
customer_reviews.text: While my Granddaughter loved her Caillou, I was disappointed that his hat was a bit too small and wouldn't stay on his little bald head when you picked him up. There was a dot of blue paint on the back of his head And his shoes were not removable - many people commented that in previous versions they did.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R. Cady

customer_reviews.title: Just like the picture
customer_reviews.text: Looks just like the picture. The doll is 14" which is a great size. Hat comes off and fits securely when you put it on. The shoes are really cute. My son loves Caillou and this was a big hit.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Green

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: My son loves the doll .. we are actually watch caillou now lol
customer_reviews.author: Jewel Davis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for the speeding delivery the look of my grandson when he open it was priceless. Thanks again.
customer_reviews.author: jaime lozano

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this doll for my 2yr old because she loves Caillou... it was a great price and she loves to carry him everywhere. And the only thing is if you want to keep the hate you better glue it to his head
customer_reviews.author: Lmays

customer_reviews.title: Bought "used" and saved a ton !!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 yr old Grandson loves this doll !! and the one I bought was "used" so I only paid about 6.50,as opposed to 18.99 for the "new" doll and it was exactly the same as the new doll,without the box !!
customer_reviews.author: T. Downey

customer_reviews.title: Great doll!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great doll! It's the perfect size for my 2 year old. He loves Caillou so much and we were so excited to get this for him! He loves to carry it around and sleep with him, and especially to hold him while he watches the show!
customer_reviews.author: vku14

customer_reviews.title: Stupid doll
customer_reviews.text: We have a 10 year old granddaughter and the little woman thinks that the kid still watches the constant reruns of this goody goody driviel. So she made me buy it got it before the pagan Holliday though
customer_reviews.author: Tony K

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves this
customer_reviews.text: We gave this to our daughter for her second birthday. She loves everything Caillou and this doll instantly became her favorite toy. She hauls it around with her everywhere. Both the doll and the clothes seem to be high quality. The hat is hard to keep on, but the shoes are a little tight so that they stay on well and wont fall off and get lost.
customer_reviews.author: T. Booker

customer_reviews.title: two is better than one
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these dolls for my grandson. One at my house and one for his house. Its better than a pet at his age. No mess no fuss no problem
customer_reviews.author: gerry

customer_reviews.title: Not a durable doll
customer_reviews.text: We love Caillou and were so excited to see this doll for my son. But within five minutes the arm had fallen off. We have twice had to reattach his arm in less than 24 hours, but my son still really loves the doll. For the price, it should be much more durable.
customer_reviews.author: Stacia L.

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: My 2yr old loves it! Caillou seems to be making it through my daughter's roughness with him but she loves him soo much!
customer_reviews.author: Tlg78

customer_reviews.title: Love Caillou - SO Disappointed in this toy's construction
customer_reviews.text: Within one week of having the Caillou doll, his arm started falling off. We requested a replacement, but unfortunately we are having the same problem with the second one within two weeks of receiving it! For $35, I would expect far better construction quality. I'm so disappointed and unsure of what to do because my little guy loves Caillou SO much. My recommendation would be to not purchase this item and avoid the disappointment for your own little one.
customer_reviews.author: TremoloHoney

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for any child!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a gift for my daughter who loooves the show and now she loooves him even more!!.. Can't put this doll down and takes him where ever we go!!.. Can't get it out of her hands!! 100 percent satisfied!!!
customer_reviews.author: Audrey

customer_reviews.title: ehh
customer_reviews.text: Its okay. My daughter is in love with caillou. But I really felt like the whole doll itself could've been of better quality. It wasn't that good but hey my 2 yr old likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Monique

customer_reviews.title: Caillou doll
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old loves Caillou and she loves her doll - she sleeps with it every night - and always gives him kisses - It is a great gift for any child who is into Caillou - I think it was the best birthday gift she received this year!!!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Hetge

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his Caillou doll and it's the perfect size for toddlers.
customer_reviews.author: mvalt

customer_reviews.title: My son LOVES Calliou however the arms fall off this doll
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to buy this for my son who watches Calliou everyday. He was so happy when he opened it christmas morning. Now, both arms are falling off this doll. My son is so upset his buddy's arms are coming off. Very disappointing. Please let me know who makes this doll. I would like to send them a letter and let them know how disppointed we are in this product. Especially for the price we paid. I would expect it to be better made. It is hard to see my son so upset.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Fink

customer_reviews.title: Very cute, but the cheaper one is softer and more cuddly
customer_reviews.text: The smaller one that is all material is better - I have seen that one. This one has a heavy plastic head and isn't very cuddly. It's okay, but save some money and get the smaller, all-cloth version.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M

customer_reviews.title: Nice doll. Looks just like the cartoon
customer_reviews.text: Nice doll. Looks just like the cartoon. The only 2 complaints i have is that the Hat does not stay on. We lost it the first day we got it. Also, the shirt is hard 2 keep clean. The material attracts lots of lint
customer_reviews.author: Carla bisaillon

customer_reviews.title: Cute Caillou Doll
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old loves Caillou and when he opened this present he was so excited. He carries Caillou around and brings him on trips. Great gift!
customer_reviews.author: T. Doyle

customer_reviews.title: cailou doll
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this doll for my daughters birthday. I thought it was a plush doll but its more of an actual hard rubber/plastic doll, but shes loves it, so job accomplished.
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Pricey, but he is loved.
customer_reviews.text: This is not a cheap doll, but it was the hit of the holidays. Caillou goes to daycare, sleeps with his two-year old mama and eats dinner at the table. He is a well-loved guy.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney D

customer_reviews.title: 3 yr old in-love with his Caillou!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son as a reward for being completely potty trained and he absolutely loves it! He calls his Caillou doll his "son".
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for Christmas for my daughter.
customer_reviews.text: She loves it. She is a fan of Sprout.com and loves Calliou. She carries him everywhere!! I was thrilled with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: FloZmo

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I returned this product because the arm fell off after my daughter opened to package.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: New Best Friend
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter doesn't go anywhere without her Caillou doll! It has become her new best friend! Recommended for all Caillou fans!
customer_reviews.author: B Lobb

customer_reviews.title: Great doll for a decent price
customer_reviews.text: You can't find this doll anywhere around Christmas time, so I was lucky enough to get order this one. I read a lot of reviews about it being cheaply made and it's limbs falling off but the doll we received was nothing like that. I tugged the arms pretty good after opening the package and it is very well made for a kids doll. My son loves it and despite the bad reviews it really is a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Brookshire

customer_reviews.title: It's Okay
customer_reviews.text: I thought the quality was a little light for the price. To be fair, however, Caillou is a hot commodity these days which always requires a higher price tag than an item deserves.
customer_reviews.author: Cherie Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this doll for my 3 yr. old granddaughter who loves Caillou. The cap didn't fit on the head so it stays on. Within two weeks the arms were hanging on. They are attached with plastic cable ties. Within another week the head which is also attached with plastic cable ties started to detach from the body. I sewed them back on the best I could with needle and thread. I do not recommend purchasing this doll...it frayed and easily tears apart. Too bad, my granddaughter really loves Caillou. I also purchased one for my grandson at the same time. He didn't play with it as much so he gave his to her.
customer_reviews.author: Jill of all Trades

customer_reviews.title: Caillou Doll
customer_reviews.text: My grand daughter (whom just turned one) loves Caillou. She takes him where ever she goes. She removes his hat and then has learned to put it back on. The doll is so remarkably close in looks to the cartoon that I was amazed when I received it. She had no trouble identifying him. Very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Caillou Classic Doll Is A Great Doll!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughters love this doll! I bought two, they watch caillou everyday and they run and get this doll while they watch the movie ! It is made very well and is very cute and is exactly like caillou on tv! We love this doll!
customer_reviews.author: Cha Cha

customer_reviews.title: Awesome...
customer_reviews.text: The service was amazing... I ordered the doll on a Wednesday nigh and it was on my front door on Friday morning. The quality of the doll was just as expected and my little girl is in love with it.
customer_reviews.author: Leticia Gaytan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The baby girls LOVES Caillou. His hat doesn't stay on well so...that's lost. But, oh well.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie R.

customer_reviews.title: Package arrived on time but the doll was missing clothing ...
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived on time but the doll was missing clothing. It was only wearing a shirt. No Hat and no Shorts.. Doll was meant as a gift for my Daughter who loves Cailou but now im stuck looking for replacement. Doll clothes that will fit the doll.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely loved the product and price
customer_reviews.text: Very happy I was able to purchase this doll and not break the bank...Amazon is very affordable and makes my children very happy and my wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: It was an amazing toy and my niece loves it. She was so happy with it on Christmas morning. Now she sleeps with it. Every night.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany D. Gray

customer_reviews.title: Quality is great!
customer_reviews.text: My son is a fanatic of Calliou. This doll is worth your money! Quality is great!
customer_reviews.author: Anna from Cincinnati Ohio

customer_reviews.title: Cailliou's friend
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves Caliou and is on his second doll after wearing out the first one. My son in law prefers to call Calliou an action figure! Either way he's a hit!
customer_reviews.author: montana gal

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a cute Caillou doll. My 2 year old just loves him, and sleeps with him every night. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: bsdavis16

customer_reviews.title: Come on
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed when received what is sposed to be a brand new toy. The box it comes in was trashed and falling apart. The hat has strands of nylon string hanging off and bunched up into balls. Looks very cheaply made. But my Lil girl will love this. I was very excited to be getting it for her till I seen the box it came in. And I payed extra 20+ for over night.
customer_reviews.author: daniel werre

customer_reviews.title: Caillou!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 19 months old and LOVES Caillou. I purchased the doll for her and she just adors it. The only negative thing about this doll is the material, it attracks lint and dust and everything that comes in contact with it. You need to use a lint brush on a daily basis.
customer_reviews.author: PATRICIA BANKER

customer_reviews.title: My toddler loved it she does everything with her caillou doll going ...
customer_reviews.text: My toddler loved it she does everything with her caillou doll going to buy another looks just like him!!!
customer_reviews.author: yaminah

customer_reviews.title: Thank you
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved it! It arrived a bit late as the services with I-parcel transfer the logistics to a local courrier in Brazil (Correios). It was a bit annoying tracking the package locally and took them some time be delivered (6 days delay). But in the end, it worked and we were all happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Passadore

customer_reviews.title: Caillou doll
customer_reviews.text: This doll has been absolutely PREFECT for my 2 year old granddaughter. She loves it and sits with it and watches Caillou on PBS. Sleeps with him every night !!
customer_reviews.author: Ddt630

product_meta.title: Caillou 14" Classic Doll
product_meta.description:
Embark on an adventure with the Classic Caillou Friend Doll! Based on the character from the popular Canadian television series, this 14" doll brings the jovial 4-year-old to life. Dressed in his bright red shoes, the inquisitive Caillou is ready to explore the world and wants you to follow along. Skillfully crafted for small hands and youthful imaginations, this little companion is a great choice for the Caillou enthusiast in your family. Carefully sculpted details give the Caillou doll added appeal, and the trademark baseball cap completes his fun-loving ensemble. Help Caillou experience all the wonders of being a child that audiences around the world can relate to: the first day of school, caring for a pet, learning a new sport or spending time with family.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Caillou boy-doll of 36cm with head, hands and feet made of vinyl. Character from the famous TV series. Stimulates the imagination and creativity. Participates in the emotional development. Improve sociability and language. Boys and girls alike will enjoy hanging out with their pal, Caillou.
feature_bullets: Boys and girls will enjoy hanging out with their pal, Caillou
For kids 1 year old and up
